name: zapier-generator
description: Generate Zapier integration from OpenAPI schema

scripts.generate:clean: node scripts/generate_zapier_from_openapi.js --clean && cd generated && echo 'copying environment' && cp ../.env .env && echo 'installing dependencies...' && npm install
scripts.zapier:login: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform login
scripts.zapier:install: cd generated && cp -f ../.env .env 2>/dev/null || true && npm install
scripts.zapier:test: node scripts/ensure-test-symlink.js && cd generated && cp -f ../.env .env 2>/dev/null || true && npm exec -- zapier-platform test -- --exit
scripts.zapier:push: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform push
scripts.zapier:validate: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform validate
scripts.zapier:users:invite: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform users:invite
scripts.zapier:users:list: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform users:list
scripts.zapier:users:links: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform users:links
scripts.zapier:version:delete: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform delete:version
scripts.zapier:versions: cd generated && npm exec -- zapier-platform versions
